english.segment1: telescope, I see you. have a vision for me. nights spent in solitude. of discovery. I don't know. if I have the courage to speak. of what i've discovered
english.segment2: only copernicus. measurements of magnificence. only copernicus. instruments of intelligence. only copernicus. symmetry of astronomy. only copernicus. blasphemy and heresy
english.segment3: instruments, I see you. have a number for me. my words sync with your words. as I state my beliefs. I don't know. if I have the courage to speak. of what i've discovered
